author: Staff Reporter
text:
Couple gets life term for killing youth

Principal District Judge S. Ramathilagam on Tuesday sentenced a couple to undergo life imprisonment for murdering a youth in Kolli Hills in 2011.

The prosecution case was that Chandran alias Devachandran (42) of Viralikalkadu in Kolli Hills, and wife Poongudi (35) killed Balakumar (23) by

serving food mixed with poison on

January 24, 2011 and threw the body into forest area. They burnt his mobile phone too.

Balakumar was having an illicit relationship with Poondudi but later she complained to her husband that Balakumar was harassing her.

The judge imposed a fine of Rs. 5,000 too on each of them.
title: Couple gets life term for murder
